entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
